title: Duplex Unit Overlooking Patio & Garden
posting_body: Bright rooms with large windows facing west, partial views of the city.
Recently refinished hardwood floors through out.
Everything recently painted.
Retro tiled kitchen & bath.
Bedroom has a sizable closet and hallway offers a linen closet with shelving for extra storage.
Kitchen has lots of cupboard space, pantry, utility cart & dining area.
Additional bar with cabinets above & below works well for a workstation.
Unit overlooks the quiet patio & garden in backyard.
A single car garage for storage only is available for an additional $100/mo.
City permit parking allows for convenient street parking.
Duplex is perfectly located.
With a Walk Score of 85 this unit offers much for the person on foot.
A five minute walk to the El Cerrito Plaza Bart, AC Bus & Transbay Lines are within two blocks and just a couple of blocks from El Cerrito Plaza ...
Lucky, Trader Joes, eateries, banking, post office and laundromat.
Two blocks from library, El Cerrito Natural Grocery Company, theatre & dry cleaners.
Near hiking and biking trails.
Landlord pays water & garbage.
Street parking and sorry but no laundry.
No smoking.
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional deposit.
1st months rent and $2500 security deposit required.
Available First Week Of September 2022
PLEASE DO NOT DISTURB TENANTS!
